articles.author: Deutsche Welle (www.dw.com)
articles.title: ESA scratches ExoMars 2022 launch for this year - DW (English)
articles.description: Russia's attack on Ukraine makes the EU-Russia joint effort to discover life on Mars impossible to realize at this time, says the European Space Agency.
articles.content:
The European Space Agency's ExoMars 2022 mission won't launch in September as planned after the agency suspended all cooperation with Russia's space program Roscosmos.
